snippet.title: GO HEROES Prometheus Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/happyland-games/go-heroes
Steam Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1183560/GO_HEROES/

Explore the everlasting ancient Greek world. Steal the Fire of the Gods and fight mythical creatures, collect loot, and wield legendary weapons in a unique action-turn-based battle system that will encourage you to push forward at great speed through environmental puzzles in a mythological setting.

• Release Date: Coming soon
• Platform: PC, Switch, xBox, PS
KICKSTARTER: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/happyland-games/go-heroes
STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1183560/GO_HEROES/
Website: https://goheroes.games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/goheroes.games/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/goheroes_games
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/goheroes.game/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/goheroes
